text:
Our company has a pretty standard HubSpot CMS theme, making use of the design manager, templates, modules, drag and drop etc, so non-technical editors can create/edit pages and we can edit CSS/HTML as needed in the design manager.

On the product side, we have a React app and we have the need to bring in a React component to demo functionality in our website. Is there a way to bring in a React component as a module, or something similar? I don’t really want to have to rebuild the entire website in React.

Hey Beth, you’re in luck! This is actually the best way to handle React in HubSpot. This should get you started: <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-react-boilerplate|https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-react-boilerplate>
